sen.j: 高倉通（たかくらどおり）は京都市の南北の道路の一つ。
sen.e: The Takakura-dori Street is a north-south running street in Kyoto City.
The Takakura-dori Street is a street runinng north-south in Kyoto City.
The Takakura-dori Street is a street running north-south in Kyoto City.

sen.j: 平安京の高倉小路にあたる。
sen.e: It corresponds to the Takakura-koji Street of Heiankyo.
It corresponds to the Takakura-koji Street of Heiankyo.
It corresponds to the Takakura-koji Street of Heiankyo.

sen.j: 北は丸太町通から南は高倉陸橋（竹田街道と接続）までだが、途中、渉成園により中断している。
sen.e: It runs from the Marutamachi-dori Street in the north to the Takakura Rikkyo overpass (connected with the Takeda-kaido Road), but is interrupted halfway by Shoseien.
It runs from Marutamachi-dori Street in the north to the Takakura Rikkyo overpass (connected with the Takeda-kaido Road), but is interrupted halfway by Shoseien.
It runs from Marutamachi-dori Street in the north to the Takakura Rikkyo overpass (connected with the Takeda-kaido Road), but is interrupted halfway by Shoseien.
